results.name: wordpress-namespace/wordpress-service

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-deployment-7c4bfcd69d-tqqrm], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service can't find any ready endpoints because the pod 'wordpress-deployment-7c4bfcd69d-tqqrm' isn't ready.

Solution: 1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`. 2. Inspect pod logs with `kubectl logs <pod-name>`. 3. Verify readiness probe settings. 4. Ensure the pod's container is running correctly.

results.name: wordpress-namespace/wordpress-deployment-7c4bfcd69d-tqqrm

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.
